attributes.action: No coal should be brought from countries that hold the same HSE standards as Britian
attributes.additional_details: We have enormous resourceous of coal.  We can de-gas flue it, but at the moment we bring in Brazilian etc coal whom have no safety records.  We shoudln't buy coal from a country that has no HSE.  OK we should look at di-sulphlusiration, but we should boycott all othe sources
